name: Basic Code Sequence
description: This macro specifies the default set of Attributes encapsulated in the Items of Code Sequence Attributes. These Attributes comprise the Code Sequence Macro.

name: Enhanced Code Sequence
description: This macro specifies the default set of Attributes encapsulated in the Items of Code Sequence Attributes. These Attributes comprise the Code Sequence Macro.

name: Code Sequence
description: This macro specifies the default set of Attributes encapsulated in the Items of Code Sequence Attributes. These Attributes comprise the Code Sequence Macro.

name: Person Identification
description: This Macro may be invoked to specify a coded representation of a person such as a healthcare worker, and the organization to which they are responsible.

name: Content Item
description: A Content Item is a flexible means of encoding attribute identifiers and attribute values using the Code Sequence Macro (see This macro ) for coded terminology defined by a coding scheme. The Content Item provides a name-value pair, i.e., a Concept Name, encoded as a Code Sequence, and a Concept Value. The Concept Value may be encoded by any of a set of generic Attributes, as specified by a Value Type, including text, personal name, numeric, and coded concept (Code Sequence) values.

name: Content Item with Modifiers
description: Content Item with Modifiers is a means of describing structured content which needs a Content Item with single optional level of modifiers, i.e. a two-level structure of Content Items. An invocation of the Content Item with Modifiers Macro will usually specify the allowed values using a Protocol Context Template in PS3.16, which allows a single Nesting Level (see in Section 6.1.2 “Nesting Level (NL)” in PS3.16 ). Constraints on the use of this Macro may be specified in PS3.16 Annex C, which may be invoked in IODs in PS3.3.

name: Image SOP Instance Reference
description: Table 10-3. Image SOP Instance Reference Macro Attributes

name: Referenced Instances and Access
description: Table 10-3. Image SOP Instance Reference Macro Attributes

name: Storage
description: Table 10-3. Image SOP Instance Reference Macro Attributes

name: Series and Instance Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Series and Instance Reference Macro, which lists Series, and SOP Instances within those Series.

name: General Anatomy Mandatory
description: This macro , Table 10-6, Table 10-7 and Table 10-7b specify the Attributes for identifying the general region of the Patient anatomy examined using coded terminology, as well as the principal structure(s) within that region that is the target of the current SOP Instance. The only differences between the Macros are the Type and Number of Items of the Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218) Attribute. Table 10-8 describe the Attributes for the coding of the principal structure only.

name: General Anatomy Required
description: This macro , This macro , Table 10-7 and Table 10-7b specify the Attributes for identifying the general region of the Patient anatomy examined using coded terminology, as well as the principal structure(s) within that region that is the target of the current SOP Instance. The only differences between the Macros are the Type and Number of Items of the Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218) Attribute. Table 10-8 describe the Attributes for the coding of the principal structure only.

name: General Anatomy Optional
description: This macro , This macro , This macro and Table 10-7b specify the Attributes for identifying the general region of the Patient anatomy examined using coded terminology, as well as the principal structure(s) within that region that is the target of the current SOP Instance. The only differences between the Macros are the Type and Number of Items of the Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218) Attribute. Table 10-8 describe the Attributes for the coding of the principal structure only.

name: Multiple Site General Anatomy Optional
description: This macro , This macro , This macro and This macro specify the Attributes for identifying the general region of the Patient anatomy examined using coded terminology, as well as the principal structure(s) within that region that is the target of the current SOP Instance. The only differences between the Macros are the Type and Number of Items of the Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218) Attribute. Table 10-8 describe the Attributes for the coding of the principal structure only.

name: Primary Anatomic Structure
description: This macro , This macro , This macro and This macro specify the Attributes for identifying the general region of the Patient anatomy examined using coded terminology, as well as the principal structure(s) within that region that is the target of the current SOP Instance. The only differences between the Macros are the Type and Number of Items of the Anatomic Region Sequence (0008,2218) Attribute. This macro describe the Attributes for the coding of the principal structure only.

name: Request Attributes
description: Table 10-9. Request Attributes Macro Attributes

name: Basic Pixel Spacing Calibration
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Basic Pixel Spacing Calibration Macro.

name: SOP Instance Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the SOP Instance Reference Macro, which references a SOP Instance.

name: Content Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Content Identification Macro, which identify and describe a SOP Instance potentially created by a human user interacting with an application.

name: Enhanced Content Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Enhanced Content Identification Macro, which identifies content using a label supporting lower case characters and specified character sets. If a Code String is required, see Section 10.9 “Content Identification Macro”.

name: Extended Content Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Extended Content Identification Macro, which identifies content using a label supporting lower case characters and specified character sets. If a Code String is required, see Section 10.9 “Content Identification Macro”.

name: Content Creator
description: Table 10.9.3-1. Content Creator Macro Attributes

name: General Contributing Sources
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the General Contributing Sources Macro, which describe the general characteristics of the contributing sources used to create a new SOP Instance.

name: Contributing Image Sources
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Contributing Image Sources Macro, which describe the image related characteristics of the contributing image sources used to create a new SOP Instance (e.g., a volume SOP Instance).

name: Patient Orientation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Orientation Macro, which describe the Patient Orientation related to gravity and equipment.

name: Patient Orientation And Equipment Relationship
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Orientation Macro, which describe the Patient Orientation related to gravity and equipment.

name: Performed Procedure Step Summary
description: Table 10-16. Performed Procedure Step Summary Macro Attributes

name: HL7v2 Hierarchic Designator
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the HL7v2 Hierarchic Designator Macro, which identify an entity (system, organization, agency, or department) that has responsibility for managing or assigning a defined set of instance identifiers (such as placer or filler number, Patient identifiers, provider identifiers, etc.). This entity could be a particular health care application such as a registration system that assigns Patient identifiers, a governmental entity such as a licensing authority that assigns professional identifiers or drivers' license numbers, or a facility where such identifiers are assigned.

name: Issuer of Patient ID
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Issuer of Patient ID Macro, which identify the source of Patient ID (0010,0020).

name: Algorithm Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Algorithm Identification Macro, which identifies and describes the algorithm used to create or derive a SOP Instance contents. An algorithm is described by the Algorithm Family, a specific Algorithm Name, and an Algorithm Version. A character string containing parameters that were used in the algorithm can be included.

name: Selector Attribute
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Selector Attribute Macro, which identify either a particular value of an Attribute, all values of an Attribute, a specific Item in a Sequence, or all Items in a Sequence. The Attribute or Item may be nested within one or more Sequences, and/or a Private Attribute.

name: Extended Selector Attribute
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which identify either a particular value of an Attribute, all values of an Attribute, a specific Item in a Sequence, or all Items in a Sequence. The Attribute or Item may be nested within one or more Sequences, and/or a Private Attribute.

name: Externally-Sourced Data Set Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Externally-Sourced Data Set Identification Macro, which identify an Externally-Sourced Data Set.

name: Exposure Index
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Section 10.19 Exposure Index Macro, which describe the Exposure Index for single projection X-Ray images, as described by IEC 62494-1 and the report of AAPM Task Group 116.

name: Mandatory View and Slice Progression Direction
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Mandatory View and Slice Progression Direction Macro, which describe the view, and in the case of cardiac views, the direction of the slices relative to the cardiac anatomy.

name: Optional View and Slice Progression Direction
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Optional View and Slice Progression Direction Macro, which describe the view, and in the case of cardiac views, the direction of the slices relative to the cardiac anatomy.

name: Numeric Value
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Numeric Value Macro, which is used to relate and convey a numeric value to a coded concept.

name: RT Equipment Correlation
description: Table 10-27. RT Equipment Correlation Macro Attributes

name: Device Motion Control
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Device Motion Control Macro, which describe requirements on performing the movement of a device from an actual to a desired position.

name: Attribute Value Constraint
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Attribute Value Constraint Macro, which allows an Attribute to be identified and to have constraints placed on acceptable values for that Attribute. An Attribute being constrained is referred to in the Macro as a Selector Attribute.

name: Attribute Value
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Attribute Value Macro, which includes an Attribute to store a value of a specified VR.

name: Reference Location
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Reference Location Macro, which allows a reference location in the context of a Patient or scan to be identified and described. E.g., the Macro may describe an anatomically defined location along the axis of a CT scan to prescribe the extent of a scan or reconstruction. The location might be internal to the Patient (and appear on a localizer image) or might be an external landmark (on which a laser is aligned).

name: Protocol Element Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Protocol Element Identification Macro, which identifies and describes an element in a protocol such as an acquisition protocol, a reconstruction protocol or a storage protocol.

name: UDI
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the UDI Macro, which records details associated with a Unique Device Identifier (UDI).

name: Assertion
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Assertion Macro, which is used to record Assertions made by a person or device about the content of a SOP Instance. The nature of the Assertion is defined by the Assertion Code.

name: Entity Labeling
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Entity Labeling Macro, which provides identification of an entity to a user.

name: Entity Long Labeling
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Entity Long Labeling Macro, which provides identification of an entity to a user.

name: Conceptual Volume
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Conceptual Volume Macro. A Conceptual Volume is an abstract entity used to identify an anatomic region (such as a planning target volume or a combination of multiple anatomic volumes) or non-anatomic volumes such as a bolus or a marker. A Conceptual Volume can be established without necessarily defining its spatial extent (for example a Conceptual Volume for a tumor can be established prior to segmenting it). The spatial extent of a Conceptual Volume may change over time (for example as treatment proceeds the tumor volume corresponding to the Conceptual Volume will change).

name: Conceptual Volume Segmentation Reference And Combination
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Conceptual Volume Segmentation Reference and Combination Macro, which allows the combination of Conceptual Volumes as constituents of a combined volume. A representative example is to have the Left Lung and the Right Lung segmented, and then to declare the Lungs as a combined Conceptual Volume, for which prescription constraints can be defined.

name: Device Model
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Device Model Macro, which contains general Attributes needed to specify a device model other than the device creating the SOP Instance.

name: Device Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Device Identification Macro, which identifies a (physical or virtual) device.

name: Related Information Entities
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Related Information Entities Macro, which defines references to entities and their purpose of reference. References can be made at the Study level, Series level, Instance level or Frame Level.

name: Outline Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Outline Definition Macro, which describes a 2D outline in a given coordinate system.

name: Patient to Equipment Relationship
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient to Equipment Relationship Macro, which describes the position of the patient with respect to a device. The position is defined by means of a transformation matrix between a Patient Frame of Reference and an Equipment Frame of Reference.

name: Patient Support Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Support Position Macro, which provides the device-specific geometric settings for the Patient Support device.

name: General Procedure Protocol Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the General Procedure Protocol Reference Macro, which identifies the Procedure Protocol SOP Instance and the Protocol Element related to the creation of an Instance.

name: Hierarchical Evidence Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Hierarchical Evidence Reference Macro.

name: Patient Group
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Group Macro, which describe multiple imaging subjects (such as small animals for pre-clinical research) imaged at the same time as a group. This Macro may be included in the Section C.2.2 Patient Identification Module and the Section C.7.1.1 Patient Module.

name: Image Pixel
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Section C.7.6.3.2 Image Pixel Macro, which describe and encode the pixel data of the image.

name: Image Pixel Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Section C.7.6.3.3 Image Pixel Description Macro, which are the common Attributes that describe the pixel data of the image.

name: Display Shutter
description: The Display shutter is a geometric mask consisting of one or more combined shapes that may be applied on the image for presentation purposes in order to neutralize the display of any of the pixels located outside of the shutter shape. Geometry of the shutter is specified with respect to a row and column coordinate system where the origin is the upper left hand pixel. This origin is specified by the values 1,1 for row/column. A row coordinate represents a row spacing (vertical) and a column coordinate represents a column spacing (horizontal). Up to three different shutter shapes may be used and superimposed.

name: Pixel Measures
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Pixel Measures Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame Content
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame Content Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Plane Position (Patient)
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Plane Position (Patient) Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Plane Orientation (Patient)
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Plane Orientation (Patient) Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Referenced Image
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Referenced Image Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Derivation Image
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Derivation Image Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Cardiac Synchronization
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Cardiac Synchronization Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame Anatomy
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame Anatomy Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Pixel Value Transformation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Pixel Value Transformation Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Identity Pixel Value Transformation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Identity Pixel Value Transformation Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame VOI LUT
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame VOI LUT Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame VOI LUT with LUT
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame VOI LUT With LUT Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro. This Macro contains one or more sets of linear or sigmoid window values and/or one or more sets of lookup tables.

name: Real World Value Mapping
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Real World Value Mapping Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Real World Value Mapping Item
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Contrast/Bolus Usage
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Contrast/Bolus Usage Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Pixel Intensity Relationship LUT
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Pixel Intensity Relationship LUT Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame Pixel Shift
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame Pixel Shift Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Patient Orientation in Frame
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Orientation in Frame Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame Display Shutter
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame Display Shutter, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Respiratory Synchronization
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Respiratory Synchronization Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Irradiation Event Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Irradiation Event Identification Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Radiopharmaceutical Usage
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Radiopharmaceutical Usage Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Patient Physiological State
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Physiological State Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro, which describes the physiological state of the patient.

name: Plane Position (Volume)
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Plane Position (Volume) Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Plane Orientation (Volume)
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Plane Orientation (Volume) Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Temporal Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Temporal Position Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Image Data Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Image Data Type Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Unassigned Shared Converted Attributes
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Unassigned Shared Converted Attributes Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Unassigned Per-Frame Converted Attributes
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Unassigned Per-Frame Converted Attributes Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Image Frame Conversion Source
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Image Frame Conversion Source Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Stored Value Color Range
description: This macro defines the Attributes of the Stored Value Color Range Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro.

name: Frame Usefulness
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Frame Usefulness Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro, related to the clinical usefulness of the current frame.

name: Camera Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Camera Position Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro, related to the position of the camera or the acquisition device for the current frame, with regards to the patient.

name: Time of Frame
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Time of Frame Macro, which is used as a Functional Group Macro, related to the time of frame.

name: Specimen
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which identify one or more Specimens being imaged.

name: Palette Color Lookup Table
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which describe the Lookup table data for images with Palette Color photometric interpretation.

name: Multi-energy CT X-Ray Source
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Multi-energy CT X-Ray Source Macro, which describe the CT X-Ray Source(s).

name: Multi-energy CT X-Ray Detector
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Multi-energy CT X-Ray Detector Macro, which describe the CT X-Ray Detector(s).

name: Multi-energy CT Path
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Multi-energy CT Path Macro, which describe a Multi-energy CT Path. A Multi-energy CT Path is an X-Ray source paired with a corresponding X-Ray detector for a particular energy level.

name: X-Ray Collimator Dimensions
description: An X-Ray Collimator is a device placed close to the X-Ray Source to restrict the span of the X-Ray beam. It is often made of lead shutters. This module presents in a graphical form its relationship with the Field Of View Dimensions (0018,1149).

name: X-Ray Filtration
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to the filtration of X-Rays during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: X-Ray Grid Description
description: This Module describes the Attributes related to the use of a grid to reduce scatter of X-Rays during the acquisition of an X-Ray image.

name: Beam Limiting Device Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Beam Limiting Device Position Macro, which specify the Beam Limiting Device Sequence.

name: Patient Support Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Patient Support Identification Macro, which identify the Patient Support System.

name: Digital X-Ray Detector
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which describe a DX detector.

name: Plane Position (Slide)
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Plane Position (Slide) Macro.

name: Optical Path Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Optical Path Identification Macro.

name: Specimen Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Specimen Reference Macro. This allows association of the frame with specific specimens imaged on the same slide (e.g., tissue micro-arrays).

name: Whole Slide Microscopy Image Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Whole Slide Microscopy Image Frame Type Macro.

name: MR Image and Spectroscopy Instance
description: This macro specifies the common Attributes Enhanced MR Image Module and MR Spectroscopy Module.

name: MR Image Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Image Description Macro.

name: MR Image Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Image Frame Type Macro.

name: MR Timing and Related Parameters
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Timing and Related Parameters Macro.

name: MR FOV/Geometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR FOV/Geometry Macro.

name: MR Echo
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Echo Macro.

name: MR Modifier
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Modifier Macro.

name: MR Imaging Modifier
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Imaging Modifier Macro.

name: MR Receive Coil
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Receive Coil Macro.

name: MR Transmit Coil
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Transmit Coil Macro.

name: MR Diffusion
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Diffusion Macro.

name: MR Averages
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Averages Macro.

name: MR Spatial Saturation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Spatial Saturation Macro.

name: MR Metabolite Map
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Metabolite Map Macro.

name: MR Velocity Encoding
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Velocity Encoding Macro. This Functional Group contains the velocity encoding values as valid for the reconstructed Images, rather than for their acquisition. The velocity encoding directions for acquisition are described in the Velocity Encoding Acquisition Sequence (0018,9092) defined in the MR Pulse Sequence Module.

name: MR Arterial Spin Labeling
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Arterial Spin Labeling Macro.

name: Functional MR
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Functional MR Macro.

name: MR Spectroscopy Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Spectroscopy Frame Type Macro.

name: MR Spectroscopy FOV/Geometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Spectroscopy FOV/Geometry Macro.

name: MR Spectroscopy Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the MR Spectroscopy Description Macro, which describe the Spectroscopy.

name: CT Image Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Image Frame Type Macro.

name: CT Acquisition Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Acquisition Type Macro.

name: CT Acquisition Details
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Acquisition Details Macro.

name: CT Table Dynamics
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Table Dynamics Macro.

name: CT Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Position Macro.

name: CT Geometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Geometry Macro.

name: CT Reconstruction
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Reconstruction Macro.

name: CT Exposure
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Exposure Macro.

name: CT X-Ray Details
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT X-Ray Details Macro.

name: CT Pixel Value Transformation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Pixel Value Transformation Macro.

name: CT Additional X-Ray Source
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the CT Additional X-Ray Source Macro. This Sequence may be multi-valued, depending on the number of additional active X-Ray sources. It defines the X-Ray source parameters beyond the basic system.

name: Multi-energy CT Characteristics
description: This Macro specifies the Attributes for CT Image Characteristics.

name: Multi-energy CT Processing
description: This Macro defines the Attributes for Multi-energy CT processing.

name: Common CT/MR and Photoacoustic Image Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Common CT/MR and Photoacoustic Image Description Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Acquisition Parameters
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which describe patient clinical conditions related to an Ophthalmic Tomography image acquisition.

name: Ophthalmic Frame Location
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Frame Location Macro. This is used to provide a frame location relative to one or more referenced images. This Macro describes a frame perpendicular or parallel to the reference image; it describes column locations for frames that are scanned either uniformly along a line segment, or with a non-uniform spacing along any trajectory in the reference image.

name: X-Ray Frame Characteristics
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Frame Characteristics Macro.

name: X-Ray Field of View
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Field of View Macro.

name: X-Ray Exposure Control Sensing Regions
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Exposure Control Sensing Regions Macro, which describe the region targeted as area where the X-Ray dose value is estimated.

name: X-Ray Frame Pixel Data Properties
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Frame Pixel Data Properties Macro.

name: X-Ray Frame Detector Parameters
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Frame Detector Parameters Macro.

name: X-Ray Calibration Device Usage
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Calibration Device Usage Macro.

name: X-Ray Object Thickness
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Object Thickness Macro.

name: X-Ray Frame Acquisition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Frame Acquisition Macro.

name: X-Ray Projection Pixel Calibration
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Projection Pixel Calibration Macro.

name: X-Ray Positioner
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Positioner Macro. If included into the Shared Functional Groups Sequence (5200,9229) no DYNAMIC motion was performed during acquisition. If included in the Per-Frame Functional Groups Sequence (5200,9230) the indication of a DYNAMIC motion is given.

name: X-Ray Table Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Table Position Macro.

name: X-Ray Collimator
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Collimator Macro.

name: X-Ray Isocenter Reference System
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Isocenter Reference System Macro.

name: X-Ray Geometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Geometry Macro.

name: Segmentation
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Segmentation Macro.

name: Segment Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Segment Description Macro.

name: X-Ray 3D General Shared Acquisition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray 3D General Shared Acquisition Macro, which specify the Attributes that are applicable for all the projection images belonging to this acquisition context.

name: X-Ray 3D General Per Projection Acquisition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray 3D General Per Projection Acquisition Macro, which specify the Attributes that are applicable for a single projection belonging to this acquisition context.

name: X-Ray 3D General Positioner Movement
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray 3D General Positioner Movement Macro, which describe the movement of a positioner during the acquisition of more than one projection.

name: X-Ray 3D Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray 3D Frame Type Macro.

name: Breast Biopsy Target
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast Biopsy Target Macro.

name: PET Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Frame Type Macro.

name: PET Frame Acquisition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Frame Acquisition Macro.

name: PET Detector Motion Details
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Detector Motion Details Macro.

name: PET Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Position Macro.

name: PET Frame Correction Factors
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Frame Correction Factors Macro.

name: PET Reconstruction
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Reconstruction Macro, which describe the method used to reconstruct this image.

name: PET Table Dynamics
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the PET Table Dynamics Macro, which describes the table motion during acquisition of the data.

name: US Image Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the US Image Description Macro.

name: Cylinder Sequence
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Cylinder Sequence Macro

name: Prism Sequence
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Prism Sequence Macro.

name: Lensometry Measurements
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Lensometry Measurements Macro.

name: Keratometric Measurements
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Keratometric Measurements Macro.

name: Subjective Refraction Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the subjective refractive measurements of a patient's eyes. Usually both eyes are measured, but sometimes just one.

name: Visual Acuity Measurements
description: This module defines the Attributes used to represent the subjective measurements of a patient's visual acuity. Usually each eye is measured individually, but sometimes only one eye is measured; sometimes the visual acuity of both eyes working together is measured. The visual acuity may be measured uncorrected, or with various refractive corrections, such as best corrected distance, pinhole, habitual near, etc

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Length Segmental Measurements
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Length Segmental Measurements Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Related Information
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Related Information Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Selected
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Selected Macro. These are the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Length (0022,1019) selected for use in IOL calculations.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Length Quality Metric
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Quality Metric Macro.

name: Intraocular Lens Calculations
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Intraocular Lens Calculations Macro.

name: Keratometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Keratometry Macro.

name: IOL Ophthalmic Axial Length
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the IOL Ophthalmic Axial Length Macro.

name: Calculated IOL
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Calculated IOL Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Quality Image SOP Instance Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Axial Measurements Quality Image SOP Instance Reference Macro

name: Calculated Toric Power
description: This macro specifies and describes the Attributes that identify the toric amount of calculated refractive power used in IOL calculation.

name: Cornea Measurement
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Cornea Measurement Macro used in IOL calculation.

name: Ophthalmic Visual Field Global Index
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Visual Field Global Index Macro.

name: Ophthalmic Patient Clinical Information and Test Lens Parameters
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Ophthalmic Patient Clinical Information and Test Lens Parameters Macro.

name: Intravascular OCT Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Intravascular OCT Frame Type Functional Group.

name: Intravascular Frame Content
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Intravascular Frame Content Functional Group.

name: Intravascular OCT Frame Content
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Intravascular OCT Frame Content Functional Group.

name: Breast X-Ray Positioner
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast X-Ray Positioner Macro.

name: Breast X-Ray Detector
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast X-Ray Detector Macro.

name: Breast X-Ray Geometry
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast X-Ray Geometry Macro.

name: Breast X-Ray Acquisition Dose
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast X-Ray Acquisition Dose Macro.

name: Breast X-Ray Isocenter Reference System
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Breast X-Ray Isocenter Reference System Macro.

name: X-Ray Grid
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Grid Macro.

name: X-Ray Filter
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the X-Ray Filter Macro.

name: Parametric Map Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Parametric Map Frame Type Macro.

name: Table Summary Statistics
description: This Macro encodes summary statistics derived from a set of values.

name: Photoacoustic Excitation Characteristics
description: This macro are Photoacoustic excitation attributes that are recorded during Photoacoustic frame acquisition and may vary across frames.

name: Photoacoustic Image Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Photoacoustic Image Frame Type Functional Group Macro.

name: Photoacoustic Image Data Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Photoacoustic Image Data Type Functional Group Macro.

name: Photoacoustic Reconstruction Algorithm
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Photoacoustic Reconstruction Algorithm Functional Group Macro.

name: Confocal Microscopy Image Frame Type
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Confocal Microscopy Image Frame Type Macro

name: Text Style Sequence
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Text Style Sequence Macro.

name: Line Style Sequence
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Line Style Sequence.

name: Fill Style Sequence
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Fill Style Sequence Macro.

name: Waveform Filter Characteristics
description: This Macro contains properties of analog and digital filters applied to waveform data. It can be used for filter settings applied on the recording device at the time of data acquisition as well as for filter settings used to achieve a specific waveform display.

name: Waveform Filter Lookup Table
description: This Macro contains attributes of a Waveform Filter Lookup Table.

name: Modality LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which describe the Modality LUT.

name: VOI LUT
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which describe the VOI LUT.

name: Presentation State Relationship
description: Table C.11.11-1b. Presentation State Relationship Macro Attributes

name: Threshold Sequence
description: The Threshold Sequence is defining the values of the image that are used or ignored.

name: Digital Signatures
description: This Macro allows Digital Signatures to be included in a DICOM Data Set for the purpose of insuring the integrity of the Data Set, and to authenticate the sources of the Data Set. This macro defines the Attributes needed to embed a Digital Signature in a Data Set. This Macro may appear in individual Sequence Items as well as in the top level Data Set of the SOP Instance.

name: Original Attributes
description: Every transfer of a SOP Instance may result in Attribute coercion (see Section B.4.1.3 “Coercion of Attributes” in PS3.4) by the receiving application. The receiving application may also detect and correct errors in SOP Instances to bring them into conformance with the SOP Class definition without changing the SOP Instance UID or creating a derived Instance (see status Warning in Section 9.1.1.1.9 “Status” in PS3.7 and Section B.2.3 “Statuses” in PS3.4.

name: Hierarchical SOP Instance Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Hierarchical SOP Instance Reference Macro, which reference a list of SOP Instances.

name: Hierarchical Series Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which reference a list of SOP Instances.

name: Identified Person or Device
description: This macro defines the Attributes that identify a person or a device. This Macro contains content equivalent to TID 1002 (see PS3.16).

name: Referenced Request
description: This macro defines the Attributes of a Requested Procedure that was associated with production of a Document.

name: Document Content
description: Table C.17-5. Document Content Macro Attributes

name: Document Relationship
description: Table C.17-6. Document Relationship Macro Attributes

name: Numeric Measurement
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Numeric Measurement Macro, which convey a NUM (numeric measurement) value.

name: Code
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Code Macro, which convey a CODE value.

name: Composite Object Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Composite Object Reference Macro, which convey a reference to a DICOM Composite Object that is not a DICOM Image or Waveform (such as an SR Document), or to an HL7 Structured Document.

name: Image Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Image Reference Macro, which convey a reference to a DICOM image.

name: Waveform Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Waveform Reference Macro, which convey a reference to a DICOM waveform.

name: Spatial Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Spatial Coordinates Macro, which convey Spatial Coordinates in an SCOORD Content Item. An SCOORD Content Item shall always be the Source Content Item of one or more SELECTED FROM Relationships with IMAGE Target Content Items. Each IMAGE Target Content Item shall contain a reference to one single-frame or multi-frame Image.

name: Temporal Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Temporal Coordinates Macro, which convey TCOORD Content Items. A TCOORD Content Item shall be the Source Content Item of one or more SELECTED FROM relationships with one or more SCOORD Content Items, one or more IMAGE Content Items, or one or more WAVEFORM Content Items.

name: Container
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Container Macro, which convey a CONTAINER Content Item.

name: 3D Spatial Coordinates
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the 3D Spatial Coordinates Macro, which convey 3D Spatial Coordinates in an SCOORD3D Content Item.

name: Table Content Item
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Table Content Item Macro, which convey a TABLE (two-dimensional tabulated data) Content Item value.

name: Screen Specifications
description: This module specifies the Attributes of the This macro , which identify and describe the best suited display environment for a Hanging Protocol.

name: Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Context
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Context Macro, which identify the context for a Data Element Tag that is used as a Selector Attribute (0072,0026) in Image Set Selector Sequence (0072,0022), Filter Operations Sequence (0072,0400), or Sorting Operations Sequence (0072,0600). The Attribute may be an Attribute nested within a Sequence or Functional Group Sequence, and/or a Private Attribute.

name: Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Value
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Hanging Protocol Selector Attribute Value Macro, which identify the value(s) for a Data Element Tag that is used as a Selector Attribute (0072,0026) in the Image Set Selector Sequence (0072,0022) or Filter Operations Sequence (0072,0400).

name: Points
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Points Macro.

name: Vectors
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Vectors Macro.

name: Surface Mesh Primitives
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Surface Mesh Primitives Macro.

name: Planning Landmark Point
description: This macro , Table C.29.1.5-3 and Table C.29.1.5-4 contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Planning Landmark Line
description: This macro , This macro and Table C.29.1.5-4 contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Planning Landmark Plane
description: This macro , This macro and This macro contain Macros for the definition of landmarks that can be used during planning to align an implant template with patient geometry.

name: Display QA Result Context
description: This Macro records the context for a set of collected display QA results: when they were produced, the person/device that produced them.

name: Visual Evaluation Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Visual Evaluation QA task by a human for a Display System.

name: Luminance Uniformity Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Luminance Uniformity QA task for a Display Subsystem.

name: Luminance Result
description: This Macro records the result of a Luminance QA task for a Display Subsystem.

name: Radiation Fraction Pattern
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Radiation Fraction Pattern Macro, which describe the intended fraction pattern to be used to deliver the radiation treatment.

name: RT Treatment Phase
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Treatment Phase Macro, which contain the identification and additional information about an RT Treatment Phase.

name: RT Treatment Phase Interval
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Treatment Phase Interval Macro, which contain the information about time-relationship between RT Treatment Phases. This consists of sets of pair-wise relationships, declaring the relation of a earlier phase to a later, potentially overlapping, phase.

name: Dosimetric Objective
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Dosimetric Objective Macro, which specify an intended goal to be used in the definition of the dosimetric plan, for plan optimization etc. Dosimetric Objectives may define limits which affect the dose, such as dose volume constraints, minimum or maximum dose, treatment time or MU limits, and radiobiologic effects.

name: Radiobiological Dose Effect Description
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Radiobiological Dose Effect Description Macro, which describe whether dose values are provided as physical dose or effective dose. An effective dose value incorporates adjustments to dose by taking into account the radiobiological effects.

name: RT Radiation Common Base
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Radiation Common Base Macro.

name: Treatment Device Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Treatment Device Identification Macro, which identify a device used to deliver radiation to the patient during a radiotherapy treatment session.

name: RT Patient Support Devices
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Patient Support Devices Macro, which identify a patient support device (table, table top, chair or similar) which shall be used for treatment.

name: RT Accessory Device Identification
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Accessory Device Identification Macro, which identify an RT accessory device and its location.

name: RT Treatment Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Treatment Position Macro, which establish a connection between the patients geometry and the treatment delivery equipment to define the treatment position. When used in an RT Radiation object, this treatment position is the prescribed position. When used in an RT Radiation Record object, this treatment position is the record of the actual position during treatment delivery. When used in an Enhanced RT Image or Enhanced Continuous RT Image object, this position is the record of the actual position during acquisition.

name: RT Control Point General
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Control Point General Macro, which specifiy the base Attributes for the definition of an RT Radiation Control Point.

name: External Beam Control Point General
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the External Beam Control Point General Macro, which specify the RT Control Point Attributes used to model external beam radiation.

name: Radiation Generation Mode
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Radiation Generation Mode Macro, which are required to generate radiation by a delivery device.

name: RT Beam Limiting Devices Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Beam Limiting Devices Definition Macro, which describe the configuration of Beam Limiting Devices which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Beam Limiting Device Opening
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Beam Limiting Device Opening Macro, which define the opening created by RT Beam Limiting Devices at a specific Control Point or set of Control Points.

name: Wedges Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Wedges Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Wedge Positions
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Wedge Positions Macro, which define the positions of Wedges used in a specific Control Point or set of Control Points.

name: Compensators Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Compensators Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Blocks Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Blocks Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Accessory Holders Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Accessory Holders Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery and which are used to hold accessories such as blocks or compensators.

name: General Accessories Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the General Accessories Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: Boluses Definition
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Boluses Definition Macro, which define the geometric configuration elements which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Tolerance Set
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Tolerance Set Macro, which contain information describing the maximum differences between planned and delivered values. This information is used in the context of delivery of the RT Radiation Set. If the absolute difference between a planned and delivered value exceeds the tolerance value, then it is expected that the delivery of the RT Radiation Set will be inhibited unless an authorized operator confirms that the tolerance may be exceeded.

name: Interlock
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Interlock Macro.

name: RT Beam Limiting Device Definition
description: This Macro describes the configuration of a Beam Limiting Device which cannot vary during delivery.

name: RT Beam Limiting Device Opening Definition
description: This Macro defines the opening created by a RT Beam Limiting Device.

name: RT Beam Limiting Device Opening Sequence
description: This Macro defines the opening created by RT Beam Limiting Devices for a specific frame.

name: Patient Position Acquisition Device
description: The Patient Position Acquisition Device Macro contains all parameters that describe a device to acquire artifacts to detect the patient position.

name: RT Patient Position Scope
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Patient Position Scope Macro, which define the RT Radiation Set, RT Radiation Instances or the Treatment Position Groups to which a set of positioning parameters apply.

name: RT Patient Position
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the RT Patient Position Macro, which define a patient position in a treatment delivery or imaging session. This patient position may be specified as an absolute position of the patient positioning device or as relative displacement against a specified reference location.

name: RT Patient Position Scope With Legacy Support
description: The RT Patient Position Scope With Legacy Support Macro defines the RT Radiation Set, RT Radiation Instances, Treatment Position Groups or RT Plan Instances to which a set of positioning parameters apply.

name: RT Projection Imaging Request Geometry
description: The RT Projection Imaging Request Geometry Macro describes the location of the imaging source and image receptor to be used for acquisition.

name: Matrix-based RT Imaging Geometry
description: The Matrix-based RT Imaging Geometry Macro describes the location of the imaging source and image receptor by the means of matrices with respect to the Equipment Frame of Reference.

name: Parameterized RT Imaging Geometry
description: This Macro defines positioning of the image radiation source and the image receptor by the means of device parameters.

name: RT Imaging Aperture
description: The RT Imaging Aperture Macro defines the aperture of the imaging device to be applied during image acquisition.

name: 3D RT Cone-Beam Imaging Geometry
description: The 3D RT Cone-Beam Imaging Geometry Macro describes the parameters to be applied for a Cone-Beam acquisition in a Radiotherapy context.

name: KV Radiation Image Acquisition Parameters
description: The KV Radiation Image Acquisition Parameters Macro contains parameters specifying details of X-Ray generation for image acquisition using kV-level radiation.

name: MV Radiation Image Acquisition Parameters
description: The MV Radiation Image Acquisition Parameters Macro contains parameters specifying details of X-Ray generation for image acquisition using MV-level radiation.

name: RT Image Frame General Content
description: The RT Image Frame General Content Macro contains information about the geometric and dosimetric context of a frame reconstructed for use in or acquired during Radiotherapy treatment sessions.

name: RT Image Frame Imaging Device Position
description: The RT Image Frame Imaging Device Position Macro contains the specification of the position of the imaging source and the imaging device.

name: RT Image Frame Radiation Acquisition Parameters
description: The Radiation Image Acquisition Parameters Macro contains parameters specifying details of generation of the radiation used for image acquisition.

name: RT Image Frame Context
description: The RT Image Frame Context Macro contains information about the context of a frame constructed for use in, or acquired during, Radiotherapy treatment sessions.

name: Scope of Inventory
description: This macro specifies the Key Attribute valuesthat select the Studies included in the Inventory, i.e., the Scope of Inventory.

name: Stored File Access
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Stored File Access Macro, which describe non-DICOM protocol access to a stored SOP Instance in the DICOM File Format, possibly contained in a container file.

name: Inventory Reference
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Inventory Reference Macro, which describe a referenced Inventory SOP Instance, and its referenced Inventory SOP Instances in a hierarchical tree.

name: Access End Points
description: This macro specifies the Attributes of the Access End Points Macro, which describe the available network access protocol end point(s), i.e., network addresses, for referenced SOP Instances.
